item.description:
REUNION FRIDAYS AT CAPRICE PRESENTS THE INDIA REPUBLIC DAY DESI PARTY

INDIA REPUBLIC DAY DESI Theme Party with DJ PRATHEEK!

In 2012 we bring you a more exciting Bigger and Better Version of Desi Fridays with more music more masti more Dhamaal. RA ONE might be out. Don 2 and Agneepath are Inn. The Much awaited Dhoom 3 will be out while Chikni Chameli & Kolaverdi live and continue to take over our heart..

We promise to make you dance harder this year than last  year and have Bollywood and Bhangra run through your mind.

FRIDAY, Jan 27th, 2012 - 10:30 pm - 2am

Where: CAPRICE BOSTON
275 Tremont Street,
Boston MA

Plently of Parking Nearby and Parking Garages next door.
 
Caprice Boston is Located in Downtown Boston at the Marriot.

Note the Desi Party is on the 2nd Floor of Caprice Boston.

BOSTON'S Best, DJ Pratheek spins Bollywood/ Bhangra/ Remixes all night long

Ladies free before 11:00 PM with RSVP. Gentlemen $10 all night long.
 
21 to enter.

To RSVP send email with your name + Guests to Generationdesi@gmail.com      

JAI HO !!! MERA BHARAT MAHAAAN
item.name: India Republic Day "JAI HO" Desi Party on Friday 27th
